original_text: You must warn the people who come from their towns and they ask you to judge an argument for them. The argument may be about a murder, or about anyone who has not obeyed God's laws, rules and commands. Whatever it is, you must warn people not to do things that the Lord says are wrong. If you do not warn them, God will be angry with you and the people of Judah. But if you do warn them, you will not be guilty of a sin.
korean_text: 어떤 성읍에 사는 너희 형제가 혹 피를 흘림이나 혹 율법이나 계명이나 율례나 규례로 말미암아 너희에게 와서 송사하거든 어떤 송사든지 그들에게 경고하여 여호와께 죄를 범하지 않게 하여 너희와 너희 형제에게 진노하심이 임하지 말게 하라 너희가 이렇게 행하면 죄가 없으리라

sentences.original_text: to judge an argument for them
The argument may be about a murder
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다툼은 살인 사건일 수 있다

sentences.original_text: or about anyone who has not obeyed
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 순종하지 않은 사람에 관한 것일 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord says are wrong
If you do not warn them
God will be angry with you
But if you do warn them
you will not be guilty of a sin
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 죄의 책임이 없게 될 것이다
